mapper.insert: insert into message (msg_id, content, create_datetime, update_datetime, status) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select msg_id, content, create_datetime, update_datetime, status from message
